job.title: Sr. DevOps Engineer (Service Infrastructure TuConnect)
job.description:
Senior DevOps Engineer I is a DevOps evangelist and is accountable for employing best practices and principles that make development cycles shorter and continuous delivery of high-quality software possible. He or she builds, tests, and maintains the infrastructure and tools to allow for the speedy development and release of software and Infrastructure as a code.
In collaboration with software engineers, they enable scaling the growth of software product capabilities. The incumbent is responsible for all things backend including leveraging infrastructure as code, CI/CD pipelines, and other supporting service components. The Senior DevOps Engineer I takes an automation-first approach while supporting platforms, services, and various tools. The incumbent fosters strong relationships with stakeholders, has a systems thinking mindset, and promotes a learning environment within a continuous improvement framework.
Performance. Excellence, Value. Founded in 1997, our success is built on our relationships with our clients and our ability to deliver real value. ITCO Solutions is a technology services organization specializing in Workforce Solutions, Consulting Services, and Software Licensing.
At ITCO Solutions, our goal is to create a long-term relationship by providing quality service and delivering real value to our consultants and clients. We are not a staffing firm that will just submit resumes with little value. The ITCO team works directly with the hiring manager to understand requirements so we can deliver a consultant that fits.
Providing qualified IT talent to fill client resource needs, augment staff, and deliver projects on time. Engage ITCO Workforce Solutions to bolster the capacity of your IT staff and/or extend your capabilities beyond your existing skill sets.
Streamline your adoption of technology and ensure optimal investment with ITCO Consultants.
Licensing Solutions has set a new standard of value in helping companies maximize their purchasing power across the software spectrum.
